entries.journal_entry_description: Echrhin Isdan has offered you a mystical stone. You have yet to figure out exactly what it does. He mentioned the Wookiee city, Kachirho. He wants you to gather 10 stones by the river or pond in front of the Myyydril Caverns.. What he needs them for, no one knows.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Collect 10 Smooth Stones for Echrhin Isdan. Smooth stones can be found near the river or pond in front of the Myyydril Caverns.
